translation.en: [woman 1] The Lowcountry,
translation.it: Lowcountry,

translation.en: this place that we call home…
translation.it: questo posto che chiamiamo casa…

translation.en: it's a beautiful place.
translation.it: È un posto bellissimo.

translation.en: But there's a dark side.
translation.it: Ma… c'è un lato oscuro.

translation.en: [woman 2] It didn't have to happen. They should've made it home.
translation.it: Non doveva succedere. Sarebbero dovuti tornare a casa. Tornare a casa sani e salvi.

translation.en: They should've made it home safe.
translation.it: Sarebbero dovuti tornare a casa. Tornare a casa sani e salvi.

translation.en: [woman 1] Anthony loved Mallory,
translation.it: Anthony amava Mallory

translation.en: and Anthony knew how much Mallory loved him.
translation.it: e Anthony sapeva quanto Mallory lo amava.

translation.en: [Anthony] Paul was outta-his-mind drunk.
translation.it: Paul era ubriaco fradicio.

translation.en: [woman 3] We had all, like, made it a point to say to him,
translation.it: Ci eravamo ripromessi di dirgli:

translation.en: "You need to let Connor drive or you need to let Anthony drive."
translation.it: "Devi far guidare Connor o Anthony".

translation.en: But he wouldn't listen to anybody.
translation.it: Ma non ascoltava nessuno.

translation.en: [woman 1] Everyone was like, "Paul don't drive," and Paul would snap back, and be like,
translation.it: Tutti dicevano: "Paul, non guidare", e lui rispondeva:

translation.en: "Well, this is my fucking boat, and I know this river,
translation.it: "È la mia cazzo di barca e conosco questo fiume,

translation.en: and you're not driving my boat."
translation.it: non la guiderete voi".

translation.en: [Anthony] The boat was just steady makin' circles.
translation.it: La barca girava su se stessa.

translation.en: We were just round and round, zigzaggin', arguin', you know. Everybody's mad.
translation.it: Giravamo e giravamo, zigzagando, e discutevamo. Tutti arrabbiati.

translation.en: He would just leave the wheel unattended. Connor would have to come up and grab it.
translation.it: Aveva lasciato il timone. Connor avrebbe dovuto afferrarlo.

translation.en: [Anthony] All I could hear was her screamin', and then the bow of the boat stood up.
translation.it: L'ho sentita solo urlare, poi la prua della barca si è alzata.

translation.en: I heard a scream, and then a bang.
translation.it: Ho sentito un urlo e poi un botto.

translation.en: -[operator] 911, where is your emergency? -[Anthony] Paul, what bridge is this?
translation.it: 911, dov'è l'emergenza? Paul, che ponte è questo?

translation.en: [woman 3] Everything was going crazy. People were screaming.
translation.it: Era tutto un casino. Gli altri gridavano.

translation.en: [woman 1] It fucking hurts!
translation.it: Fa male, cazzo!

translation.en: [Anthony] Soon as I got on the bank…
translation.it: Una volta arrivato a riva,

translation.en: …Miley came running straight up to me and asked, "Where's Mallory?"
translation.it: Miley è corsa da me e mi ha chiesto: "Dov'è Mallory?"

translation.en: And then that's when we all started screamin' for Mallory.
translation.it: E allora tutti abbiamo iniziato a chiamarla.

translation.en: [woman 3] Mallory!
translation.it: Mallory!

translation.en: Where the fuck is Mallory?
translation.it: Dove cazzo è Mallory?

translation.en: [Anthony] Bo, you fuckin' smilin' like it's fuckin' funny?
translation.it: Sorridi come se fosse divertente?

translation.en: My fuckin' girlfriend's gone, Bo!
translation.it: La mia ragazza è andata!

translation.en: [reporter 1] Five made it ashore alive, 19-year-old Mallory Beach did not.
translation.it: Cinque sono sbarcati vivi, la diciannovenne Mallory Beach no.

translation.en: [Anthony] Do y'all know Alex Murdaugh?
translation.it: Conoscete Alex Murdaugh?

translation.en: [deputy] I know that name. [Anthony] That's his son.
translation.it: - Sì, conosco quel nome. - È suo figlio.

translation.en: Good luck.
translation.it: Buona fortuna.

translation.en: [reporter 2] The controversy isn't about the crash,
translation.it: La controversia non riguarda solo l'incidente,

translation.en: but why Murdaugh hasn't been booked into jail.
translation.it: ma il perché Murdaugh non sia stato arrestato.

translation.en: [man 1] This was a family that you didn't want to mess with.
translation.it: Era una famiglia che non volevi avere contro.

translation.en: They could have something swept under the rug, and no one would ever know about it.
translation.it: Potrebbero nascondere qualcosa sotto il tappeto e nessuno lo saprebbe.

translation.en: [reporter 3] Paul Murdaugh observed driving grossly intoxicated.
translation.it: Paul Murdaugh guidava in stato di ebbrezza.

translation.en: [reporter 4] Some in the community questioning
translation.it: Alcuni nella comunità si chiedono

translation.en: if the family used their connections to protect Paul.
translation.it: se la famiglia abbia usato le sue conoscenze per proteggerlo.

translation.en: [man 2] He wanted to make sure that
translation.it: Voleva assicurarsi che…

translation.en: lips were sealed.
translation.it: nessuno parlasse.

translation.en: It does say in the Old Testament, "An eye for an eye."
translation.it: L'Antico Testamento dice: "Occhio per occhio".

translation.en: I think Paul was afraid.
translation.it: Credo che Paul avesse paura.

translation.en: [operator] Hampton County 911, what's your emergency?
translation.it: Hampton County 911, qual è l'emergenza?

translation.en: This is Alex Murdaugh.
translation.it: Sono Alex Murdaugh.

translation.en: My wife and child have been shot badly.
translation.it: Mia moglie e mio figlio sono stati uccisi.

translation.en: [woman 1] The boy I dated for four years was murdered. I mean, this is scary.
translation.it: Il ragazzo che ho frequentato quattro anni è stato ucciso. Orribile.

translation.en: How did so many people lose their lives?
translation.it: Come hanno fatto così tante persone a perdere la vita?

translation.en: [operator] 911, where's your emergency?
translation.it: Hampton County 911, dov'è l'emergenza?

translation.en: [driver] I see somebody layin' out
translation.it: Vedo qualcuno disteso

translation.en: in the road.
translation.it: per strada.

translation.en: Why did he not kill me too?
translation.it: Perché non ha ucciso anche me?

translation.en: [man 3] Everybody has a skeleton in the closet.
translation.it: Tutti hanno scheletri nell'armadio.

translation.en: I'm thinkin', "A skeleton in the closet? What the hell's he talkin' about?"
translation.it: Penso: "Scheletro nell'armadio? Di cosa parla?"

translation.en: [Anthony] I did hear names.
translation.it: Ho sentito dei nomi.

translation.en: [man 4] She was like, "You'd never believe who did it."
translation.it: Ha detto: "Non crederai mai chi è stato".

translation.en: [woman 4] Her head is bleeding. I cannot get her up.
translation.it: Le sanguina la testa. Non riesco a farla alzare.

translation.en: [operator] Do you guys know who she is?
translation.it: Sapete chi è?

translation.en: [woman 4] Ma'am, can you stop asking all these questions--
translation.it: Signora, smetta di fare domande…

translation.en: [man 1] Five bodies in six years tagged to this family.
translation.it: Cinque cadaveri in sei anni per questa famiglia.

translation.en: That is absolutely frightening.
translation.it: È spaventoso.

translation.en: [reporter 5] Still no sign of a teenager thrown overboard.
translation.it: Ancora nessuna traccia della ragazza caduta in mare.

translation.en: The boat she and five friends were riding on hit a piling in Archers Creek.
translation.it: La barca su cui era con cinque amici ha urtato una trave ad Archers Creek.

translation.en: 19-year-old Mallory Beach hasn't been seen since 2:00 Sunday morning.
translation.it: La diciannovenne Mallory Beach non si trova dalle 2:00 di domenica.

translation.en: Meanwhile, dozens of family members and friends have been standing by, hoping for a miracle.
translation.it: Intanto, decine di familiari e amici sono in attesa, sperando in un miracolo.

translation.en: [Mallory] Where's Mal?
translation.it: Dov'è Mal?

translation.en: -Lily, where's Mal? -[dog barks]
translation.it: Lily, dov'è Mal?

translation.en: Where's Mal?
translation.it: Dov'è Mal?

translation.en: Your ear don't itch. Where's Mal?
translation.it: Non ti prudono le orecchie. Dov'è Mal?

translation.en: Says my name is Mallory.
translation.it: Dice che mi chiamo Mallory.

translation.en: [announcer] Enjoys playing softball and playing with her friends.
translation.it: Le piace giocare a softball e giocare con i suoi amici.

translation.en: [Anthony] I met Mallory when we were kids.
translation.it: Ho conosciuto Mallory quando eravamo bambini.

translation.en: My sister and her sister were best friends,
translation.it: Le nostre sorelle erano migliori amiche

translation.en: and even if we didn't like it, we were kind of stuck together, you know.
translation.it: e, anche se non ci piaceva, stavamo insieme.

translation.en: [man 5] They'd go to church with us and we'd carry 'em to Sunday school.
translation.it: Venivano in chiesa con noi quando andavamo al catechismo.

translation.en: Anthony's dad built my first house.
translation.it: Il padre di Anthony ha costruito la mia prima casa.

translation.en: Mallory was about three or four years old and jumpin' on the trampoline
translation.it: Mallory aveva tre o quattro anni e saltava sul trampolino mentre lavoravamo.

translation.en: while we were tryin' to work.
translation.it: saltava sul trampolino mentre lavoravamo.

translation.en: [Anthony] I'd honestly say me and Mallory were probably best friends
translation.it: Direi che io e Mallory eravamo migliori amici

translation.en: before we were anything, you know?
translation.it: prima che nascesse altro.

translation.en: [Miley] He was always scared of her.
translation.it: Aveva paura di lei.

translation.en: He was scared to date her.
translation.it: Lui temeva di chiederle di uscire.

translation.en: Because she was intimidating to him. [laughs]
translation.it: Perché lei lo intimidiva.

translation.en: [Beverly] She brought out a side of him that we had not seen in a long time.
translation.it: Ha tirato fuori un lato di lui che non vedevamo da molto tempo.

translation.en: [girl] Mallory!
translation.it: Mallory!

translation.en: [Anthony] I was, you know, a little bit of a partier.
translation.it: Ero un festaiolo.

translation.en: When I finally changed all that and settled down,
translation.it: Quando tutto è cambiato e mi sono sistemato,

translation.en: it really did make me happy.
translation.it: ero davvero felice.

translation.en: As we got older, we both knew that we wanted to be together.
translation.it: Crescendo, sapevamo di voler stare insieme.

translation.en: [Miley] They started datin', New Year's.
translation.it: Si sono messi insieme a Capodanno.

translation.en: She was like, "Oh my gosh, like, finally." She loved him so much.
translation.it: E lei pensava: "Finalmente". Lo amava tanto.

translation.en: ♪ The butterflies fly away ♪
translation.it: Le farfalle volano via BUON ANNO

translation.en: [Miley] I mean, it's Mallory. Like, how can you get any better than her?
translation.it: Voglio dire, è Mallory. Come puoi essere migliore di lei?

translation.en: My friends are Miley…
translation.it: I miei amici sono Miley…

translation.en: [Miley] Mallory's my best friend since Pre-K.
translation.it: Mallory è la mia migliore amica dall'asilo.

translation.en: She came up to me and told me I was pretty and, um, the rest is history.
translation.it: È venuta da me e mi ha detto che ero carina, e il resto è storia.

translation.en: I was just this little shy girl.
translation.it: Ero solo una bambina timida.

translation.en: She was this little fireball, just talking nonstop.
translation.it: Lei era una peperina, parlava senza sosta.

translation.en: And Morgan, she came later in life.
translation.it: E Morgan, è arrivata dopo.

translation.en: Once we got to know Morgan, we just started to hang out a lot more.
translation.it: Dopo aver conosciuto Morgan, abbiamo iniziato a frequentarci di più.

translation.en: We became really close.
translation.it: Siamo diventate amiche.

translation.en: The first time I met Mallory, we had gone to a party.
translation.it: La prima volta che ho incontrato Mallory, eravamo a una festa.

translation.en: Hey, I like that one.
translation.it: Ehi, mi piace.

translation.en: [Morgan] Mallory came right up to me and she complimented my shoes,
translation.it: Mallory è arrivata e si è complimentata per le scarpe.

translation.en: so I knew we were gonna be really good friends after that.
translation.it: Da quel momento siamo diventate buone amiche.

translation.en: Morgan, Miley, and Mallory.
translation.it: Morgan, Miley e Mallory.

translation.en: We are all M's.
translation.it: Tutte con la M.

translation.en: We all have really big personalities and so, like, they all kind of just mesh into, like, one,
translation.it: Abbiamo tutte personalità forti che interagiscono

translation.en: and we'd feed off of each other.
translation.it: e questo ci dà energia.

translation.en: The girls were all really good friends, and then so were the boys.
translation.it: Le ragazze erano molto amiche e anche i ragazzi.

translation.en: [Anthony] Connor was my cousin,
translation.it: Connor era mio cugino.

translation.en: That's been my best friend since I can remember.
translation.it: E il mio migliore amico da che mi ricordo.

translation.en: If I was hangin' with Connor, I was hangin' with Miley and Mallory.
translation.it: Se uscivo con Connor, uscivo con Miley e Mallory.

translation.en: How are you supposed to do that?
translation.it: Come pensi di farlo?

translation.en: [Miley] It just worked out perfectly.
translation.it: Era perfetto.

translation.en: I was dating Connor, Mallory was dating Anthony,
translation.it: Io uscivo con Connor, Mallory con Anthony

translation.en: and Morgan was dating Paul.
translation.it: e Morgan con Paul.

translation.en: I felt like an outsider whenever I started high school.
translation.it: Al liceo mi sentivo un'emarginata.

translation.en: And that's where I met Paul.
translation.it: Ed è lì che ho incontrato Paul.

translation.en: He was in my history class. Like, our energies kinda matched.
translation.it: Era nella mia classe di storia. Le nostre energie combaciavano.

translation.en: We would just have fun, just the two of us,
translation.it: Ci divertivamo, solo noi due,

translation.en: and we would just goof around.
translation.it: e scherzavamo.

translation.en: So I think it was his playful personality that really…
translation.it: Penso che sia stata la sua personalità giocosa che…

translation.en: That brought me into him at first.
translation.it: mi ha fatto innamorare all'inizio.

translation.en: [Morgan] Get him, Sam!
translation.it: Prendilo, Sam!

translation.en: We started dating my junior year.
translation.it: Ci siamo messi insieme quando ero in terza.

translation.en: [Anthony] Paul had never had a girlfriend.
translation.it: Paul non aveva mai avuto una ragazza.

translation.en: I think I probably got on her nerves a little bit 'cause I showed up so much.
translation.it: Credo di averle dato sui nervi perché ero sempre in mezzo ai piedi.

translation.en: There was a few times when she was like, "I wish this stupid joker would go home."
translation.it: A volte diceva: "Vorrei che questo pagliaccio tornasse a casa".

translation.en: You know? Like, I was always intrudin'.
translation.it: Mi intromettevo sempre.

translation.en: I liked Morgan,
translation.it: Morgan mi piaceva,

translation.en: and they loved each other, and I was happy for 'im.
translation.it: loro si amavano, e io ero felice per lui.

translation.en: I've known Paul since I was a kid.
translation.it: Conosco Paul da quando ero un bambino.

translation.en: We did from A to Z together.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto tutto insieme.

translation.en: Huntin', fishin'.
translation.it: Cacciare, pescare.

translation.en: I loved bein' around Paul.
translation.it: Amavo stare con Paul.

translation.en: And Morgan, I'm sure she fell in love with his personality fast.
translation.it: E Morgan si è innamorata subito della sua personalità.

translation.en: Just as funny of a person as you'll ever meet.
translation.it: La persona più buffa mai incontrata.

translation.en: [Morgan] ♪ Hey! ♪
translation.it: Ehi!

translation.en: [Paul] ♪ Hey! ♪
translation.it: Ehi!

translation.en: [woman 6] Paul was always there.
translation.it: Paul c'era sempre.

translation.en: Valentine's Day, birthdays, and everything else, with gifts.
translation.it: San Valentino, compleanni, sempre con regali.

translation.en: [Bill] Banners for the prom.
translation.it: Gli striscioni per il ballo.

translation.en: The things he would do. It was like he's this wonderful young man.
translation.it: Le cose che faceva. Sembrava un giovanotto meraviglioso.

translation.en: We're dating.
translation.it: Stiamo insieme.

translation.en: You want your families to mingle, but my family wasn't from around here.
translation.it: Vuoi che le famiglie si frequentino, ma i miei non erano di qui.

translation.en: We're both from Long Island.
translation.it: Siamo di Long Island.

translation.en: I'm a nurse in a prison. I'm a landscape architect and designer.
translation.it: - Io sono infermiera in una prigione. - Io architetto paesaggista e designer.

translation.en: We keep to ourselves. We all work and just do our thing.
translation.it: Siamo riservati. Lavoriamo e badiamo ai fatti nostri.

translation.en: I had no idea who he was.
translation.it: Non sapevo chi fosse.

translation.en: [man 1] Hampton County is a beautiful, wonderful part of South Carolina.
translation.it: Hampton County è una parte meravigliosa del South Carolina.

translation.en: Nobody ever comes here unless you are from here.
translation.it: Nessuno viene mai a meno che non sia del posto.

translation.en: Everybody knows everybody.
translation.it: Tutti conoscono tutti.

translation.en: And everybody knows who the Murdaughs are.
translation.it: E tutti sanno chi sono i Murdaugh.

translation.en: Because the Murdaugh family run the biggest law firm in town.
translation.it: Perché gestiscono il più grande studio legale in città.

translation.en: The Murdaugh family has been around Hampton County for years.
translation.it: La famiglia Murdaugh vive a Hampton County da anni.

translation.en: It all started with Paul's great-great-granddad, Randolph Murdaugh Sr.
translation.it: Tutto è iniziato con il trisnonno di Paul, Randolph Murdaugh Senior.

translation.en: And then it went to Randolph's son, Buster Murdaugh.
translation.it: E poi è passato al figlio di Randolph, Buster Murdaugh.

translation.en: And finally it went to Randolph Murdaugh, Paul's granddad.
translation.it: E quindi a Randolph Murdaugh, il nonno di Paul.

translation.en: All of them had the law firm together, and then they served as solicitors.
translation.it: Avevano lo studio legale insieme e lavoravano come procuratori.

translation.en: A solicitor is basically a lead prosecutor or district attorney.
translation.it: Un procuratore è o procuratore capo o distrettuale.

translation.en: And so, for over a century,
translation.it: Così, per oltre un secolo,

translation.en: the Murdaughs were law and order here in the 14th circuit.
translation.it: i Murdaugh sono stati l'ordine pubblico nel 14° distretto giudiziario.

translation.en: They ran both sides of the legal ledger,
translation.it: Controllavano tutto,

translation.en: from civil cases to criminal cases.
translation.it: cause civili e cause penali.

translation.en: They had a network that varied from judges and lawyers,
translation.it: Avevano una rete che variava da giudici e avvocati,

translation.en: to law enforcement, to sheriffs,
translation.it: a forze dell'ordine, sceriffi

translation.en: to the average man on the street who served on the jury.
translation.it: fino all'uomo comune che faceva parte della giuria.

translation.en: They were the law in this area.
translation.it: Erano la legge.

translation.en: And at times, they were above the law.
translation.it: E a volte erano al di sopra della legge.

translation.en: [Morgan] My family and Paul's family came from a different class.
translation.it: La mia famiglia e quella di Paul hanno estrazioni diverse.

translation.en: They just came from two totally different worlds, I think.
translation.it: Due mondi totalmente differenti.

translation.en: There was really no togetherness with our families.
translation.it: Non c'era nessun legame tra le nostre famiglie.

translation.en: I loved Paul, and I wanted to be what he wanted me to be,
translation.it: Amavo Paul e volevo essere come lui mi desiderava

translation.en: and I wanted to be what his family wanted me to be.
translation.it: e come la sua famiglia mi desiderava.

translation.en: [Bill] I mean, they took her to the Kentucky Derby.
translation.it: L'hanno portata al Kentucky Derby.

translation.en: They took her to the final four of basketball.
translation.it: L'hanno portata alle finali di basket.

translation.en: Deep-sea fishing for marlin in Guatemala.
translation.it: Alla pesca d'altura del pesce spada in Guatemala.

translation.en: So they were always going somewhere.
translation.it: Andavano sempre da qualche parte.

translation.en: [Morgan] I'm taking you by the house that Paul grew up in.
translation.it: Ti porto alla casa dove è cresciuto Paul.

translation.en: Where is this? That's Randolph Murdaugh's house.
translation.it: Eccola. È la casa di Randolph Murdaugh.

translation.en: So this first driveway is Paul's old driveway.
translation.it: Questo primo vialetto è il vecchio vialetto di Paul.

translation.en: You can't see it. It's a big house.
translation.it: Non si vede. È una casa grande.

translation.en: They have a private drive.
translation.it: C'è una strada privata.

translation.en: They have multiple different houses.
translation.it: Hanno diverse case.

translation.en: One example is Moselle.
translation.it: Una, per esempio è la Moselle.

translation.en: I think it's like a thousand acres that are owned by Alex,
translation.it: Credo siano migliaia di ettari di proprietà di Alex,

translation.en: and it's like on the outskirts of Hampton.
translation.it: ed è nei sobborghi di Hampton.

translation.en: Moselle was my paradise.
translation.it: La Moselle era il mio paradiso.

translation.en: Me and Paul, we'd set catfish lines, go huntin'.
translation.it: Io e Paul pescavamo il pesce gatto, cacciavamo.

translation.en: I mean, you never got bored.
translation.it: Non ti annoiavi.

translation.en: [Morgan] Paul was really big into hog hunting,
translation.it: A Paul piaceva cacciare i maiali

translation.en: so he had a bunch of dogs.
translation.it: e aveva un sacco di cani.

translation.en: They had a tractor shed where they'd keep their equipment under.
translation.it: C'era il capanno dei trattori dove tenevano gli attrezzi,

translation.en: They had a skinning shed, they had multiple ponds.
translation.it: il capanno per la scuoiatura e diversi stagni.

translation.en: You know, what country boys would usually do. It was just, tear it up and have fun.
translation.it: Ciò che fanno i ragazzi di campagna. Vivevano da selvaggi, si divertivano.

translation.en: They had an airplane, so they had actually like a landing strip for the plane,
translation.it: Avevano un aeroplano e pertanto una sorta di pista di atterraggio

translation.en: and then the plane would land inside of the shed
translation.it: e l'aeroplano atterrava dritto dentro il capanno

translation.en: that had a door that opened up.
translation.it: che aveva la porta aperta.

translation.en: [male interviewer] What was the strip for?
translation.it: A cosa serviva la pista?

translation.en: Well, the way Paul told it, it was for everything you could imagine.
translation.it: Beh, a detta di Paul, per tutto ciò che si poteva immaginare.

translation.en: Drugs and strippers and everything.
translation.it: Droga, spogliarelliste e tutto il resto.

translation.en: You can't believe everything Paul says neither, you know.
translation.it: Non si poteva credere a tutto quello che diceva.

translation.en: [Morgan] It's like a massive playground for Paul.
translation.it: Era un enorme parco giochi per Paul.

translation.en: We were always there.
translation.it: Eravamo sempre lì.

translation.en: [Morgan] Here's the law firm.
translation.it: Ecco lo studio legale.

translation.en: Every year, Hampton County hosts a watermelon festival,
translation.it: Ogni anno Hampton County ospita il festival dell'anguria

translation.en: and it's just a big gathering.
translation.it: ed è un grande raduno.

translation.en: They shut down the streets. They have vendors, food, and like drinks. Um…
translation.it: Chiudono le strade. Ci sono i commercianti, cibo, bevande…

translation.en: But Alex always allowed us to go to the firm and sneak in the back door.
translation.it: Ma Alex ci ha sempre permesso d'intrufolarci nello studio.

translation.en: And so we'd go into Alex's office, and he always had handles of liquor
translation.it: Andavamo nel suo ufficio dove teneva sempre bottiglie di liquore

translation.en: that he would offer to us and the law firm partners' children.
translation.it: che offriva a noi e ai ragazzi dei soci dello studio.

translation.en: And when I say children, we were probably, like,
translation.it: E per ragazzi, intendo che avremo avuto

translation.en: around 16 to 14 years old.
translation.it: dai 16 ai 14 anni.

translation.en: And that's the back entrance we would always go in.
translation.it: Quella è la porta sul retro da cui entravamo.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Sì.

translation.en: I didn't come from a family that drank a lot.
translation.it: Non vengo da una famiglia che beve molto.

translation.en: Like, my dad would probably have a drink here and there, but… I never saw my parents drunk.
translation.it: Mio padre ogni tanto beve un drink, ma… non ho mai visto i miei ubriachi.

translation.en: And so whenever I came around the Murdaughs, like, it was so…
translation.it: Invece, ogni volta che stavo con i Murdaugh, era…

translation.en: It was very normal for them to be drinking
translation.it: Era normale che bevessero

translation.en: and just have a lot of alcohol, like, always stocked in the house.
translation.it: e che avessero un sacco di alcolici in casa.

translation.en: But just for, like, Paul and I, being the age that we were, like,
translation.it: Ma nonostante la mia età e quella di Paul,

translation.en: they were okay with us drinking, and they would always get us alcohol.
translation.it: a loro andava bene che bevessimo e ci davano alcolici.

translation.en: And that's when I really started to drink.
translation.it: È da allora che ho cominciato a bere.

translation.en: [boy] Oh shit, bro.
translation.it: Merda, fratello.

translation.en: [Morgan] Alcohol definitely changed Paul in his manner and…
translation.it: L'alcol ha cambiato Paul, i suoi modi e…

translation.en: We called Paul "Timmy" when he was drunk. That's his name that Anthony Cook actually gave him.
translation.it: Quando era ubriaco lo chiamavamo Timmy. È il nome che gli ha dato Anthony Cook.

translation.en: It was just a random name, just for, you know…
translation.it: Era un nome a caso, perché…

translation.en: He was just a different person, 'cause he wasn't Paul anymore.
translation.it: era un'altra persona, non era più Paul.

translation.en: He was just… Hey, that's Timmy.
translation.it: Era solo… Ehi, quello è Timmy.

translation.en: [boy] Damn, son!
translation.it: Cavolo, figliolo.

translation.en: [Morgan] He would go from being, like, sweet,
translation.it: Dall'essere molto dolce,

translation.en: and then, like, two drinks in, he'd be a completely different person.
translation.it: dopo due drink, diventava una persona completamente diversa.

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation.it: Cos'hai da dire a tua discolpa?

translation.en: Three billfish, right, babes.
translation.it: Tre pasti, tesoro.

translation.en: [Morgan] No.
translation.it: No.

translation.en: Give some quality life advice, Paul.
translation.it: Dacci una perla di saggezza, Paul.

translation.en: All right.
translation.it: Va bene.

translation.en: Get you an SC Wahoo Series boat,
translation.it: Ti procuro una barca per le gare del South Carolina Wahoo,

translation.en: 'cause you don't stand a chance.
translation.it: perché non hai alcuna possibilità.

translation.en: [Morgan] Okay.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: -SC Wahoo Series. -[Morgan] Okay.
translation.it: - Le gare di SC Wahoo. - Ok.

translation.en: He would… He would start doin' some weird things with his hands, but…
translation.it: Iniziava a fare cose strane con le mani, ma…

translation.en: the biggest thing I looked at was, like, his eyes.
translation.it: la cosa che più mi impressionava erano i suoi occhi.

translation.en: It was like he was lookin' through you, you know?
translation.it: Era come se ti guardasse attraverso.

translation.en: But all it was, was he was tryin' his best
translation.it: Ma faceva solo del suo meglio

translation.en: to understand what you're sayin', you know?
translation.it: per capire quello che dicevi.

translation.en: Because he's so drunk that he…
translation.it: Perché era così ubriaco che…

translation.en: He can't really function.
translation.it: che non connetteva.

translation.en: People would say, "He looks scary." You know what I'm sayin'?
translation.it: La gente direbbe: "Fa paura.

translation.en: "He looks like he's about to kill me." No, he's just tryin' to understand you.
translation.it: Sembra che stia per uccidermi". No, cerca solo di capirti.

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.it: Che cazzo?

translation.en: What the fuck? Did you see that?
translation.it: Che cazzo? Hai visto?

translation.en: One thing a lot of people know about Paul is he liked attention.
translation.it: Una cosa che molti sanno di Paul è che amava le attenzioni.

translation.en: And I think…
translation.it: E credo…

translation.en: I think that was where that drinkin' part came from.
translation.it: che sia quella la causa del suo vizio.

translation.en: Something troubled him enough to make him drink the way he drank.
translation.it: Qualcosa lo turbava tanto da farlo bere come beveva.

translation.en: You drink like that to escape something.
translation.it: Bevi così per sfuggire a qualcosa.

translation.en: [Diane] You know, you do wonder with Paul.
translation.it: Sai te lo chiedi con Paul.

translation.en: Did he truly know that drinking as much was bad?
translation.it: Sapeva davvero che bere così tanto faceva male?

translation.en: Did he truly know that there really are consequences when you do something?
translation.it: Sapeva davvero che ci sono delle conseguenze quando fai qualcosa?

translation.en: You know? Because maybe he didn't.
translation.it: Sai? Perché forse non lo sapeva.

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.it: Non lo so.

translation.en: Morgan said that a couple of times she would try to tell his mom, Maggie,
translation.it: Morgan dice di aver tentato di dirlo a sua madre, Maggie,

translation.en: about how Paul would be drinking too much, and she would kind of just blow it off.
translation.it: che Paul beveva troppo, ma lei l'aveva ignorata.

translation.en: [Bill] His family just looked the other way, and thought it was funny, and…
translation.it: La sua famiglia guardava dall'altra parte e pensava fosse divertente…

translation.en: That would've put such a blemish on the family.
translation.it: Sarebbe stato un'onta per loro.

translation.en: They didn't wanna choose that option and say, "Let me send him to a rehab."
translation.it: Non volevano ammetterlo e dire: "Mandiamolo in riabilitazione".

translation.en: [Morgan] I felt like Maggie, as a mother,
translation.it: Per me Maggie, come madre,

translation.en: she wasn't as loving on to Paul as she was on to Buster,
translation.it: non era così amorevole con Paul quanto lo era con Buster,

translation.en: and I feel like she was a very detached mother from Paul.
translation.it: e penso che fosse una madre molto distante da Paul.

translation.en: Buster is Paul's older brother.
translation.it: Buster è il fratello maggiore di Paul.

translation.en: [announcer] Richard Alexander Murdaugh Junior.
translation.it: Richard Alexander Murdaugh Junior.

translation.en: [Morgan] Buster went to Wofford. He graduated, perfect. Maggie loved it.
translation.it: Buster è andato a Wofford. Si è laureato. Maggie lo adorava.

translation.en: He was in a fraternity. She ate it up.
translation.it: Era in una confraternita ed era esaltata.

translation.en: He went to law school, and she was over the freakin' moon.
translation.it: Lui ha studiato legge e lei era al settimo cielo.

translation.en: Buster wanted the life that his father had.
translation.it: Buster voleva la vita che aveva suo padre.

translation.en: He wanted to be a big-name lawyer.
translation.it: Voleva diventare un avvocato famoso.

translation.en: He wanted to have the wealth and the power.
translation.it: Voleva avere ricchezza e potere.

translation.en: He was following his father's footsteps.
translation.it: Seguiva le orme del padre.

translation.en: Paul never really wanted to be a lawyer.
translation.it: Paul non ha mai voluto davvero diventare avvocato.

translation.en: Paul was more like the black sheep of his family,
translation.it: Paul era la mela marcia della famiglia

translation.en: and I think that he thought that his parents thought that he was a disappointment.
translation.it: e credo che i suoi genitori lo considerassero una delusione.

translation.en: For Paul, the acceptance and the love
translation.it: Per Paul, l'accettazione e l'amore

translation.en: came from Miss Gloria.
translation.it: arrivavano dalla signorina Gloria.

translation.en: She worked for Randolph and Libby for years.
translation.it: Ha lavorato anni per Randolph e Libby.

translation.en: And that's why Alex and Maggie had her start working for them.
translation.it: Ed è per questo che Alex e Maggie l'hanno presa a lavorare per loro.

translation.en: I see Gloria as being Paul's second mom, and she basically raised Paul.
translation.it: Gloria è stata una madre per Paul, in pratica l'ha cresciuto.

translation.en: She was with him from the time that he was two.
translation.it: È stata con lui dall'età di due anni.

translation.en: Paul really clung to her because Gloria gave Paul what Maggie didn't.
translation.it: Paul era molto attaccato a lei, perché gli dava ciò che non otteneva da Maggie.

translation.en: [Anthony] Miss Gloria was one of the best ladies you'll ever meet.
translation.it: La sig.na Gloria era meravigliosa.

translation.en: She took care of Paul
translation.it: Si è presa cura di Paul

translation.en: like no family member ever did.
translation.it: come nessun membro della famiglia.

translation.en: Miss Gloria would've walked off the end of the moon for Paul Murdaugh.
translation.it: La sig.na Gloria avrebbe fatto di tutto per Paul Murdaugh.

translation.en: Paul loved Gloria.
translation.it: Paul amava Gloria.

translation.en: And, actually, I don't remember him having a picture of anybody in his wallet,
translation.it: In realtà non ricordo che avesse la foto di nessuno nel portafoglio,

translation.en: but he had a picture of Gloria in his wallet.
translation.it: ma aveva una foto di Gloria.

translation.en: [Morgan] But when Paul started getting older,
translation.it: Man mano che Paul cresceva,

translation.en: that's when his reckless behavior became much worse,
translation.it: il suo comportamento peggiorava

translation.en: and he was always getting in trouble.
translation.it: e per questo finiva sempre nei guai.

translation.en: Paul confided in his grandfather Randolph so much.
translation.it: Paul confidava molto in suo nonno Randolph.

translation.en: Any time Paul got into any trouble,
translation.it: Ogni volta che Paul si metteva nei guai,

translation.en: he would call his granddad.
translation.it: chiamava suo nonno.

translation.en: And from there, like, Randolph would call Alex,
translation.it: Poi, Randolph chiamava Alex

translation.en: and then they'd come up with a storyline, basically.
translation.it: e, in sostanza, si inventavano una storia.

translation.en: When I tell you it's like, you snap your fingers and it was gone, that's how it was.
translation.it: Se dico che schioccavano le dita e tutto spariva, era proprio così.

translation.en: Obviously, yes, I was dating him, but I knew he was a troublemaker.
translation.it: Uscivo con lui, ma sapevo che era un piantagrane.

translation.en: And it kind of made some people worried and weary of Paul coming around.
translation.it: E alcune persone erano preoccupate e stanche di Paul.

translation.en: Mallory and Paul were friends.
translation.it: Mallory e Paul erano amici.

translation.en: Like, they… They got along really well. Like, not really well, but, like, they got along.
translation.it: Andavano molto d'accordo. Beh, non molto, ma andavano d'accordo.

translation.en: It was almost kind of like they… That she tolerated Paul.
translation.it: Era come se loro… Come se lei tollerasse Paul.

translation.en: Miley hated Paul.
translation.it: Miley lo odiava.

translation.en: It wasn't really like a friendship.
translation.it: Non era proprio un'amicizia.

translation.en: In the beginning, I was like, "Morgan likes him, so obviously there's something to like about him."
translation.it: All'inizio pensavo, se a Morgan piace, ci dev'essere qualcosa di buono in lui.

translation.en: But at the same time, this is not, like, someone that I think that,
translation.it: Ma allo stesso tempo non lo considero adatto,

translation.en: first of all, should be dating one of my best friends, second of all, we should be hanging around whenever he's this intoxicated.
translation.it: intanto a frequentare una delle mie amiche e poi, a uscirci quando è ubriaco.

translation.en: Because it's not only dangerous for him, but it's dangerous for us.
translation.it: Perché non è solo pericoloso per lui, ma è pericoloso per noi.

translation.en: [Morgan] One time, we were comin' home from this Christmas party,
translation.it: Ricordo che una volta di ritorno da un party di Natale

translation.en: and we got in the truck,
translation.it: Ricordo che una volta di ritorno da un party di Natale siamo saliti sul pick-up e mi ha detto di lasciare il posto di guida.

translation.en: and he told me I needed to get out of the driver's seat.
translation.it: siamo saliti sul pick-up e mi ha detto di lasciare il posto di guida.

translation.en: And I was like, "Why?" And he's like, "I'm driving." And we got in this huge fight, and Paul was being really aggressive.
translation.it: Gli ho chiesto perché, e lui: "Guido io". Abbiamo litigato ed era molto aggressivo.

translation.en: And at first, he was drivin' like it was gonna be okay and that we'd make it home safely.
translation.it: All'inizio guidava come se fosse ok e saremmo arrivati a casa sani e salvi.

translation.en: And on that turn, Paul lost control and wrecked us into a ditch.
translation.it: Ma in una curva, Paul ha perso il controllo e siamo finiti in un fosso.

translation.en: The truck was, like, sideways.
translation.it: Il furgone era su un lato.

translation.en: He had so many guns in his car, so, like, guns were everywhere. Beer cans were everywhere.
translation.it: Aveva così tante pistole in auto, erano ovunque. Come le lattine di birra.

translation.en: So I dial 911, and Paul hangs it up and throws my phone.
translation.it: Così chiamo il 911, ma Paul riaggancia e getta il telefono.

translation.en: And Paul calls Randolph.
translation.it: Poi chiama Randolph.

translation.en: He tells him exactly where we're at, and then… Then, he calls his dad.
translation.it: Gli dice esattamente dove siamo e poi chiama suo padre.

translation.en: And then Randolph, Alex, and Maggie showed up.
translation.it: E poi Randolph, Alex e Maggie sono arrivati.

translation.en: Before they even checked on us, they opened the back of the truck
translation.it: Prima ancora di controllarci, hanno aperto il retro del pick-up

translation.en: and they took out all the guns,
translation.it: e hanno preso tutte le pistole,

translation.en: and they cleared the bed of the truck and the floors of all these beer cans.
translation.it: ne hanno ripulito il retro e raccolto le birre da terra.

translation.en: I'm like, "Are you kidding?" And they're like, "Did you call 911?"
translation.it: Io dico: "Scherziamo?" E loro: "Hai chiamato il 911?"

translation.en: I was like, "Yeah." And they were like, "Why?"
translation.it: "Sì". E loro: "Perché?"

translation.en: [Morgan] They kept tryin' to talk to me and, like, tell me that I didn't need to call 911
translation.it: Continuavano a dirmi di non chiamare il 911,

translation.en: 'cause I could've gotten their son in trouble.
translation.it: perché avrei potuto mettere loro figlio nei guai.

translation.en: We could've been dead, but,
translation.it: Potevamo essere morti ma,

translation.en: you know, nothin' came of it.
translation.it: non è successo niente.

translation.en: [Miley] It was kind of a strange relationship.
translation.it: Era una strana relazione.

translation.en: It wasn't normal in the way that they fought with each other.
translation.it: Non era normale il modo in cui litigavano.

translation.en: It was very uncomfortable for, like, other people to witness.
translation.it: Era imbarazzante per gli altri assistere.

translation.en: He would just break up with her, you know, for the weekend,
translation.it: La lasciava per il week-end

translation.en: then get back together with her and things like that.
translation.it: e poi si rimetteva con lei, cose così.

translation.en: They were just like nothing you would want anybody close to you
translation.it: Non avresti voluto che accadesse

translation.en: or that you love to go through.
translation.it: a qualcuno a cui vuoi bene.

translation.en: Me and Mallory were both like, "You need to be done."
translation.it: Io e Mallory dicevamo: "Devi finirla".

translation.en: And then, like, we'd convince her that she was. And then for some reason it was like she would always go back.
translation.it: La convincevamo, ma per qualche motivo, era come se tornasse sempre indietro.

translation.en: And it was very frustrating to see her do that, as one of her best friends.
translation.it: E, come sua migliore amica, è stato frustrante vederla fare così.

translation.en: [Morgan] I think that our relationship is just something that, like,
translation.it: Penso che il nostro rapporto sia qualcosa

translation.en: I really clung to just because when it was good, it was really good.
translation.it: a cui mi sono aggrappata perché, quando andava bene, era bello.

translation.en: But when it was bad, it was just…
translation.it: Ma quando andava male era…

translation.en: It was really bad.
translation.it: Molto brutto.

translation.en: Our relationship had gotten, like, really physical and…
translation.it: Il nostro rapporto era diventato molto fisico e…

translation.en: Then I broke up with him,
translation.it: Poi l'ho lasciato, ma Paul avrebbe

translation.en: but then Paul would just do and say anything
translation.it: Poi l'ho lasciato, ma Paul avrebbe fatto e detto di tutto per rimediare a

translation.en: to make up for what had happened.
translation.it: fatto e detto di tutto per rimediare a ciò che era accaduto.

translation.en: I'm sorry. And…
translation.it: Mi dispiace. E…

translation.en: So, like, I knew that, like…
translation.it: Sapevo che…

translation.en: And just being, like, a young 16, 17-year-old girl, like…
translation.it: Ed essere una ragazzina di 16, 17 anni…

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.it: Non lo so.

translation.en: You have this picture of just, like, a relationship in your head,
translation.it: Hai questa idea di rapporto nella tua testa,

translation.en: and I just feel like I looked past it because what I really wanted was, like,
translation.it: ma penso di averlo ignorato, perché ciò che volevo davvero era

translation.en: the Paul that I knew.
translation.it: il Paul che conoscevo.

translation.en: Gloria knew how Paul was, and she had seen him at…
translation.it: Gloria sapeva com'era Paul e l'aveva visto.

translation.en: Every emotion, every step of life, she was there.
translation.it: Ogni sua emozione, ogni istante della sua vita lei c'era.

translation.en: Gloria was like,
translation.it: Gloria diceva:

translation.en: "You know how he is, and you're either gonna have to learn how to deal with his temper, or you need to get out."
translation.it: "Sai com'è, o impari a gestire il suo caratteraccio o te ne vai".

translation.en: I remember her saying,
translation.it: Ricordo che diceva:

translation.en: "Baby, it's okay to love someone. Love 'em from a distance."
translation.it: "Cara, va bene amare qualcuno. Amare a distanza.

translation.en: "But if it's gonna hurt you more to be with them, then you need to go."
translation.it: Ma se è peggio starci insieme, allora devi andartene".

translation.en: Yeah, I got really worried one night, and it was, um…
translation.it: Una sera mi sono preoccupata molto.

translation.en: We were celebrating Buster's graduation.
translation.it: Stavamo festeggiando il diploma di Buster.

translation.en: We were staying at a hotel.
translation.it: Eravamo in hotel.

translation.en: He had been so intoxicated.
translation.it: Era così ubriaco.

translation.en: We had finally gotten to bed, and for some reason Paul kept kicking me.
translation.it: Siamo andati a letto e non so perché, continuava a tirarmi calci.

translation.en: I yelled at him, and then he got on top of me,
translation.it: Gli ho urlato contro e lui mi è salito sopra

translation.en: and I just remember him screaming,
translation.it: e ricordo che urlava:

translation.en: "I told you to shut up."
translation.it: "Ti ho detto di tacere".

translation.en: Just holding down my throat.
translation.it: E mi stringeva la gola.

translation.en: I just remember then he, like, punched me really hard, like, in the knee right here.
translation.it: E ricordo che mi ha colpito forte il ginocchio.

translation.en: And…
translation.it: E…

translation.en: I am sorry. [cries]
translation.it: Scusate.

translation.en: [Morgan] In 2019, I was just working at Retail Therapy, selling clothes.
translation.it: Nel 2019, lavoravo al Retail Therapy, vendevo abbigliamento.

translation.en: Miley, Mallory, and I were all working there.
translation.it: Io, Miley e Mallory lavoravamo lì.

translation.en: Paul and I, I was ready to get out.
translation.it: Io e Paul… ero pronta a lasciarlo, ma al contempo ero…

translation.en: But at the same time my mind… I was so back and forth.
translation.it: Io e Paul… ero pronta a lasciarlo, ma al contempo ero… ero indecisa.

translation.en: [Miley] She would come to work and, you know,
translation.it: Veniva al lavoro e, sai,

translation.en: you could tell she'd been cryin' or something,
translation.it: si capiva che aveva pianto,

translation.en: and me and Mallory would both just be like, "This isn't normal."
translation.it: e io e Mallory dicevamo: "Non è normale.

translation.en: "We're both in relationships and neither of us are going through this."
translation.it: Anche noi abbiamo una relazione, ma questo non succede.

translation.en: "We don't think you need to be with him."
translation.it: Non dovresti stare con lui".

translation.en: I was like, "You are more important than him."
translation.it: Le dicevo: "Tu sei più importante di lui".

translation.en: [Morgan] Mallory was my support, you know, system, just because she saw me every day.
translation.it: Mallory era la mia rete di sostegno, perché mi vedeva ogni giorno.

translation.en: Mallory made it a lot easier, um, for me.
translation.it: Mallory mi ha reso tutto più facile.

translation.en: [Morgan] I mean, she'd make sure that I was always laughing.
translation.it: Faceva in modo che ridessi sempre.

translation.en: She'd be so extra about it.
translation.it: Per lei era importante.

translation.en: And I'd cry at work and she'd just hug me,
translation.it: Piangevo al lavoro, e lei mi abbracciava,

translation.en: or she would just send me really uplifting messages and just, like,
translation.it: o mi mandava messaggi incoraggianti

translation.en: reminded me that I am someone without him, and that it's gonna be okay.
translation.it: e mi ricordava che ero qualcuno anche senza di lui e che sarebbe andata bene.

translation.en: Having Mallory and Miley, just…
translation.it: Avere Mallory e Miley…

translation.en: They were friends that really cared.
translation.it: erano amiche che tenevano a me.

translation.en: Good. Sit up straight.
translation.it: Bene. Siediti dritto.

translation.en: Anthony's my first cousin.
translation.it: Anthony è mio cugino.

translation.en: I'd say probably my closest cousin, honestly.
translation.it: Direi, probabilmente, quello a cui sono più legato.

translation.en: Me, Anthony, Miley, Mallory. We all started hangin' out together.
translation.it: Io, Anthony, Miley, Mallory. Abbiamo iniziato a girare insieme.

translation.en: If Miley was off doin' something or whatever with her family,
translation.it: Se Miley era occupata a fare qualcosa con i suoi,

translation.en: then it was always me and Mallory hangin' out.
translation.it: uscivamo sempre io e Mallory.

translation.en: I knew Mallory before I knew Miley.
translation.it: La conoscevo prima di Miley.

translation.en: [female interviewer] How does it feel now to talk about the incident?
translation.it: Come ci si sente a parlare dell'incidente?

translation.en: Uh… We're not gonna get into that.
translation.it: Non ne vogliamo parlare.

translation.en: Do I think that maybe
translation.it: Peno che forse…

translation.en: some things could've happened a whole lot differently?
translation.it: alcune cose sarebbero potute andare diversamente?

translation.en: I can look at you right here today and tell you,
translation.it: Posso guardarti oggi e dire

translation.en: yes.
translation.it: sì.

translation.en: [Morgan] February 2019,
translation.it: Nel febbraio del 2019

translation.en: a friend had messaged us, wanting us to go to the oyster roast.
translation.it: un amico ci ha scritto invitandoci alla grigliata di ostriche.

translation.en: [Anthony] Oyster roast is just the kind of the things you do in Lowcountry when it starts to get a little bit cold.
translation.it: La grigliata di ostriche si fa a Lowcountry quando inizia a fare freddo.

translation.en: You know, you roast oysters.
translation.it: Sai, si grigliano le ostriche.

translation.en: Mallory asked me, you know, "Hey. Everybody else wants to do this." "Can we go?"
translation.it: Mallory mi ha chiesto: "Tutti gli altri vogliono farlo. Possiamo andare?"

translation.en: And I said, "No."
translation.it: E ho risposto: "No".

translation.en: It was cold. I didn't wanna be goin' to a party.
translation.it: Fa freddo. Non volevo andare a una festa.

translation.en: Mallory wanted to go bad, you know.
translation.it: Mallory voleva proprio andarci.

translation.en: She, um, gave a little puppy-dog face, you know,
translation.it: Aveva quegli occhioni dolci,

translation.en: and asked again, and I finally gave in.
translation.it: me l'ha chiesto di nuovo e alla fine ho ceduto.

translation.en: [Morgan] Paul was messaging me. "Your girlfriends are goin'."
translation.it: Paul mi scriveva: "Le tue amiche ci vanno".

translation.en: Like, "You need to be with me."
translation.it: Tipo: "Devi stare con me".

translation.en: I felt like Paul was more, like, guilt-tripping me into going… Um…
translation.it: Paul voleva farmi sentire in colpa per spingermi ad andare,

translation.en: But I mainly went to go be with my best girlfriends.
translation.it: ma io andavo soprattutto per stare con le mie migliori amiche.

translation.en: [male interviewer] Why do you think the decision was to take the boat?
translation.it: Perché la decisione di prendere la barca?

translation.en: Just to be spontaneous.
translation.it: È stata una decisione spontanea.

translation.en: I've made the trip up and down Beaufort River a thousand times.
translation.it: Ho fatto il viaggio su e giù per il fiume Beaufort mille volte.

translation.en: I had never been that far.
translation.it: Non mi sono mai spinto così lontano.

translation.en: Paul and Connor knew what they were doin', so I trusted 'em.
translation.it: Paul e Connor sapevano quel che facevano, mi sono fidato.

translation.en: [Morgan] We just docked the boat at one of the docks,
translation.it: Abbiamo attraccato a uno dei moli

translation.en: and from there I think everyone kinda started drinkin' pretty early.
translation.it: e poi abbiamo tutti iniziato a bere.

translation.en: Right before we left, Miley and I were on the dock
translation.it: Prima di andare, io e Miley eravamo al molo

translation.en: and we looked back, and Paul had a funnel, and he was just funneling beer.
translation.it: ci siamo voltate e abbiamo visto Paul con un imbuto. Stava versando birra.

translation.en: [Miley] And then we just took off on the boat to go to the oyster roast.
translation.it: Poi siamo partiti in barca per andare alla grigliata di ostriche.

translation.en: On the way there, it was freezing. Me and Mallory were sitting on the cooler,
translation.it: Durante il tragitto, si gelava. Io e Mallory eravamo sedute sul frigo,

translation.en: so, like, we had to get up to get people drinks.
translation.it: e dovevamo alzarci per fare bere gli altri.

translation.en: [Miley] We pulled up to the dock.
translation.it: Ci siamo fermati al molo.

translation.en: We'd gotten there later because it took us so long to get there.
translation.it: Siamo arrivati tardi, perché ci abbiamo messo tanto.

translation.en: [Morgan] We left the cooler on the boat,
translation.it: Abbiamo lasciato il frigo sulla barca

translation.en: and we'd go back and forth from the dock to get our alcohol out of the boat.
translation.it: e andavamo avanti e indietro dal molo per prendere gli alcolici dalla barca.

translation.en: [Anthony] There was quite a few people that made the comment,
translation.it: C'erano parecchie persone che dicevano: "Ehi, questa cosa va per le lunghe.

translation.en: "Hey, this thing got late, you know. It's cold."
translation.it: C'erano parecchie persone che dicevano: "Ehi, questa cosa va per le lunghe. Fa freddo.

translation.en: "Might not be a very good idea to drive the boat back."
translation.it: Potrebbe non essere una buona idea tornare in barca".

translation.en: We had several people offer to drive us.
translation.it: Molti ci hanno offerto un passaggio.

translation.en: Leave the boat and they would drive us.
translation.it: Lasciare la barca, andare con loro.

translation.en: I think Paul was just a little too proud to do that.
translation.it: Paul era troppo orgoglioso per farlo.

translation.en: [Morgan] Even if someone was to take the keys from Paul and be like,
translation.it: Se qualcuno avesse preso le chiavi e gli avesse detto:

translation.en: "You're not getting on that boat," Paul would have a conniption.
translation.it: "Non salirai sulla barca", Paul avrebbe fatto una scenata.

translation.en: And Murdaughs don't really get told "no" much.
translation.it: E ai Murdaugh non vengono detti tanti "no".

translation.en: I know that Miley, Mallory, and I should've been smart enough to just stay.
translation.it: So che io, Miley e Mallory dovevamo essere furbe e restare.

translation.en: I'll never stop regretting that we didn't.
translation.it: Rimpiangerò sempre di non averlo fatto.

translation.en: [Morgan] We left around 12:00.
translation.it: Ce ne siamo andati verso mezzanotte.

translation.en: [Miley] After the oyster roast, me and Connor did get into an argument.
translation.it: Dopo la grigliata, io e Connor abbiamo litigato,

translation.en: We were arguing about him going to the bar.
translation.it: perché lui voleva andare al bar.

translation.en: You know, Paul and Connor wanted to make a pit stop nobody else wanted to make.
translation.it: Paul e Connor volevano fare una sosta che nessun altro voleva fare.

translation.en: [Morgan] Paul wanted to go to the bar,
translation.it: Paul voleva andare al bar

translation.en: and when Paul gets set on something, like, it's gonna happen.
translation.it: e quando si fissa su qualcosa, la ottiene.

translation.en: There wasn't no talkin' him out of it. There wasn't no stoppin' him.
translation.it: Non c'era modo di dissuaderlo. Non c'era modo di fermarlo.

translation.en: [Morgan] So we actually get to the Day Dock, which is downtown Beaufort.
translation.it: Quindi siamo arrivati al Day Dock, in centro a Beaufort.

translation.en: And we were just waiting for the boys to get back.
translation.it: E aspettavamo il ritorno dei ragazzi.

translation.en: At that time, Mallory and Anthony were so new
translation.it: All'epoca, Mallory e Anthony erano agli inizi

translation.en: and they were in that, like, honeymoon stage.
translation.it: nella fase luna di miele.

translation.en: They were obsessed with each other, and they were on their own little swing. Just talkin'.
translation.it: Erano presi l'uno dall'altra e stavano per conto loro, per così dire.

translation.en: Miley and I were probably talkin' about how much we hated Paul and Connor.
translation.it: Io e Miley forse parlavamo di quanto odiassimo Paul e Connor.

translation.en: [Miley] After leaving Luther's,
translation.it: Dopo aver lasciato il Luther,

translation.en: Paul comes out and, like, plastic chair right next to him,
translation.it: Paul esce con una sedia di plastica

translation.en: and he just flips the chair over.
translation.it: e la ribalta.

translation.en: I remember him, like, comin' back and him just, like,
translation.it: Ricordo che tornava indietro

translation.en: raising his arms and sprawling his hands.
translation.it: alzando le mani e gesticolando.

translation.en: [Miley] That's a dead giveaway, pretty much, that he was the whole Timmy alter ego.
translation.it: Era una prova inconfutabile che era Timmy, il suo alter ego.

translation.en: He was outta-his-mind drunk.
translation.it: Era ubriaco fradicio.

translation.en: [Miley] We had all made it a point to, like, say to him, "You need to let Connor drive or you need to let Anthony drive."
translation.it: Ci eravamo ripromessi di dirgli: "Devi far guidare Connor o Anthony".

translation.en: But he wouldn't listen to anybody.
translation.it: Non ascoltava nessuno.

translation.en: Everyone was like, "Paul, don't drive." It's late, it's cold. We wanna get home.
translation.it: Tutti dicevano: "Paul, non guidare". È tardi, fa freddo. Torniamo a casa.

translation.en: [Anthony] We talked about gettin' an Uber or somethin'.
translation.it: Abbiamo proposto di prendere un Uber.

translation.en: But, uh, Paul didn't wanna leave his boat there,
translation.it: Ma Paul non voleva lasciare lì la sua barca,

translation.en: didn't trust leavin' his boat there,
translation.it: non si fidava a lasciarla lì,

translation.en: and I'm not gonna
translation.it: e io non…

translation.en: just leave everybody else, you know?
translation.it: avrei lasciato tutti lì, no?

translation.en: I'm not gonna leave Connor, Miley, Morgan, Paul.
translation.it: Non avrei lasciato Connor, Miley, Morgan, Paul.

translation.en: [Miley] We got back on the boat to go home.
translation.it: Siamo saliti in barca per tornare a casa.

translation.en: [Morgan] Everyone was like, "Paul, don't drive," and Paul would snap back and be like,
translation.it: Tutti dicevano: "Paul, non guidare", e lui rispondeva:

translation.en: "Well, this is my fucking boat, and I know this river,
translation.it: "È la mia cazzo di barca, e conosco questo fiume,

translation.en: and you're not driving my boat."
translation.it: non la guiderete voi".

translation.en: The way Paul was driving was honestly terrifying.
translation.it: Il modo in cui Paul guidava era davvero terrificante.

translation.en: [Anthony] The boat was just steady makin' circles.
translation.it: La barca girava su se stessa.

translation.en: We were just round and round, zigzaggin', arguin', you know. Everybody's mad.
translation.it: Giravamo e giravamo, zigzagando, e discutevamo. Tutti arrabbiati.

translation.en: [Miley] Paul would just leave the wheel unattended. Connor would have to grab it.
translation.it: Aveva lasciato il timone. Connor avrebbe dovuto afferrarlo.

translation.en: I literally stood up and yelled at him,
translation.it: Mi sono alzata e gli ho gridato:

translation.en: "If you're not gonna let anybody else drive, take us home."
translation.it: "Se non fai guidare nessuno, portaci a casa".

translation.en: He got in my face and pointed at me, like, "You just need to shut the fuck up and sit down."
translation.it: Mi ha guardato e urlato in faccia: "Devi chiudere il becco e sederti".

translation.en: Anthony was getting extremely pissed.
translation.it: Anthony si stava incazzando.

translation.en: I yelled at Paul, Morgan, Miley, Connor. I yelled at all of 'em.
translation.it: Ho urlato a Paul, Morgan, Miley e Connor. Ho urlato contro tutti.

translation.en: [Morgan] Paul is yelling at me and he's like, "Why don't you have my back?"
translation.it: Paul mi grida: "Perché non mi spalleggi?"

translation.en: And I was like, "Why would I have your back?"
translation.it: E io: "Perché dovrei spalleggiarti?

translation.en: "You're screaming at us and you're not making sense."
translation.it: Ci urli contro e dici cose senza senso.

translation.en: "You're acting crazy."
translation.it: Sembri un folle".

translation.en: And he looked at me and he said, "You know what's crazy?"
translation.it: Mi ha guardato e ha detto: "Sai cos'è folle?

translation.en: "Your father not making enough money to support your family."
translation.it: Tuo padre non guadagna abbastanza per mantenervi".

translation.en: I started crying, and that's when, uh, Paul got in my face,
translation.it: Ho iniziato a piangere, e Paul ha cominciato a urlarmi in faccia, e…

translation.en: and he just started screaming, and, uh,
translation.it: e Paul ha cominciato a urlarmi in faccia, e…

translation.en: that's when Paul slapped me.
translation.it: poi mi ha schiaffeggiato.

translation.en: Then, um…
translation.it: Poi…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.it: Scusate.

translation.en: You know, you could tell by the way he did it that it wasn't the first time.
translation.it: Si capiva da come l'ha fatto, che non era la prima volta.

translation.en: It’s just heartbreaking to see one of your best friends be abused
translation.it: È stato straziante vedere una tua amica venire maltrattata

translation.en: in front of your face.
translation.it: davanti a te.

translation.en: I was like, "You can't hide it anymore from any of us." "Like, this is not okay."
translation.it: Ho detto: "Non puoi più nasconderlo a nessuno. Non va bene".

translation.en: At that moment in time, everybody was like, "You know what?" "Let's just go."
translation.it: A quel punto tutti abbiamo detto: "Sai cosa? Andiamocene".

translation.en: You know, we went from that idle to…
translation.it: Siamo passati da questa follia a…

translation.en: The bow of the boat stood up.
translation.it: La prua si è alzata.

translation.en: [Miley] He would just leave the wheel when we were goin' full speed.
translation.it: Ha lasciato il timone mentre andavamo a manetta.

translation.en: [Anthony] Connor would just reach over there from the side and straighten the wheel up.
translation.it: Connor si è allungato di lato e ha raddrizzato il timone.

translation.en: [Miley] Connor came up to me and he told me he loved me,
translation.it: Connor è venuto da me, ha detto di amarmi

translation.en: and I could tell, like, he was gettin' scared too.
translation.it: e capivo che era spaventato.

translation.en: Miley screaming, "Connor, Connor," and I felt her grab me.
translation.it: Miley urlava: "Connor, Connor". E l'ho sentita afferrarmi.

translation.en: I slid down.
translation.it: Sono scivolato.

translation.en: I put my feet up, pulled Mallory to me.
translation.it: Mi sono alzato e ho afferrato Mallory.

translation.en: [Miley] I was looking at this bridge and I was like, "We're about to hit this."
translation.it: Ho visto il ponte e pensato: "Stiamo per colpirlo".

translation.en: [Anthony] I heard a scream, then I was out.
translation.it: Ho sentito un urlo e sono caduto.

translation.en: [Morgan] Everything was going crazy. People were screaming.
translation.it: Era tutto un casino. Gli altri gridavano.

translation.en: -[Anthony] As soon as I got on the bank… -[gasps]
translation.it: Una volta arrivato a riva,

translation.en: …Miley came runnin' straight up to me and asked, "Where's Mallory?"
translation.it: Miley è corsa da me e mi ha chiesto: "Dov'è Mallory?"

translation.en: Then that's when we all started screamin' for Mallory.
translation.it: E tutti abbiamo iniziato a chiamarla.

translation.en: [Miley] Mallory!
translation.it: Mallory!

translation.en: [Morgan] Where the fuck is Mallory?
translation.it: Dove cazzo è Mallory?

translation.en: [Morgan] Anthony stayed in the water as long as he could. He would come up. He would go down.
translation.it: Anthony è stato in acqua il più possibile. Tornava su. Si reimmergeva.

translation.en: I jumped back in the water over and over and over.
translation.it: Mi sono tuffato più e più volte.

translation.en: [Miley] The water under the bridge, it was goin' so fast.
translation.it: La corrente sotto il ponte era veloce.

translation.en: [Anthony] I was goin' against the current. There you are, scared for your life.
translation.it: Andavo controcorrente. Eccoti lì, in pericolo di vita.

translation.en: It's either do or die.
translation.it: Vivere o morire.

translation.en: [Connor] I just remember wakin' up.
translation.it: Ricordo di essermi svegliato.

translation.en: First thing I could do was just get on my phone and call 911.
translation.it: La prima cosa che ho potuto fare è stato chiamare il 911.

translation.en: [operator] 911, where's your emergency?
translation.it: 911, dov'è l'emergenza?

translation.en: [Connor] We're in a boat crash on Archers Creek.
translation.it: C'è stato incidente in barca ad Archers Creek.

translation.en: [operator] You're by the bridge?
translation.it: Siete vicini al ponte?

translation.en: [Connor] There's only one bridge in Archers Creek.
translation.it: L'unico ponte di Archers Creek.

translation.en: [operator] Did you crash into the bridge?
translation.it: Siete andati contro il ponte?

translation.en: [Connor] We're under the only bridge in Archers Creek.
translation.it: Siamo sotto l'unico ponte di Archers Creek.

translation.en: [operator] All right, so you're under the bridge, okay.
translation.it: Va bene, siete sotto il ponte, ok.

translation.en: [Morgan] Mallory! Mallory!
translation.it: Mallory!

translation.en: [Connor] Please send someone.
translation.it: Mandate qualcuno.

translation.en: [operator] No, we're comin', okay?
translation.it: No, stiamo arrivando, ok?

translation.en: [Anthony] I walked up to the top of the bridge.
translation.it: Sono salito in cima al ponte.

translation.en: I remember seein' blue lights comin' from both directions.
translation.it: Ricordo di aver visto luci blu da entrambe le direzioni.

translation.en: [Morgan] It was cops that came first.
translation.it: La polizia è arrivata per prima.

translation.en: [operator] The one missing is a female.
translation.it: La persona che manca è una donna.

translation.en: I just sat in the boat, bleeding.
translation.it: Ero seduta sulla barca, sanguinante.

translation.en: It hurts! It fucking hurts!
translation.it: Fa male! Fa male, cazzo!

translation.en: So the cop that came up to me, he's like, "You're gonna be okay."
translation.it: Il poliziotto che è venuto da me ha detto: "Andrà tutto bene".

translation.en: He kept patting my back, and I was like, "Tell me y'all found Mallory."
translation.it: Mi dava pacche sulla schiena, e io: "Ditemi che avete trovato Mallory".

translation.en: And he said, "No, we haven't found Mallory yet."
translation.it: E lui: "No, non l'abbiamo ancora trovata".

translation.en: I remember my face bein' really warm.
translation.it: Ricordo che il mio viso era molto caldo.

translation.en: My bottom teeth were in front of my front teeth. I knew somethin' wasn't right.
translation.it: I denti inferiori erano davanti agli incisivi, qualcosa non andava.

translation.en: [Miley] Paul was only in his underwear,
translation.it: Paul era in mutande,

translation.en: and his only concern was calling his granddad.
translation.it: la sua unica preoccupazione era chiamare suo nonno.

translation.en: -[Paul] Can I use your phone? -[officer 1] I ain't got my phone on me.
translation.it: - Posso usare il suo telefono? - Non ho il telefono.

translation.en: [Paul] You ain't got your phone?
translation.it: Non ha il telefono?

translation.en: [officer 1] No, you dropped yours in the grass back there.
translation.it: No, hai fatto cadere il tuo nell'erba.

translation.en: [Paul] That don't surprise me.
translation.it: Non mi sorprende.

translation.en: I remember Anthony just like, "You did this. This is all your fault."
translation.it: Ricordo Anthony che diceva: "Sei stato tu. È colpa tua."

translation.en: [Anthony] Bo, you fuckin' smilin' like it's fuckin' funny?
translation.it: Sorridi come se fosse divertente?

translation.en: [officer 1] Sit down.
translation.it: Siediti.

translation.en: [Anthony] My fuckin' girlfriend's gone, Bo!
translation.it: La mia ragazza è andata!

translation.en: Hope you rot in fuckin' hell!
translation.it: Spero tu marcisca all'inferno!

translation.en: He's just agitated.
translation.it: È solo agitato.

translation.en: [Miley] It took them 15 to 20 minutes to get Paul to actually get in the ambulance.
translation.it: Ci hanno messo 15 o 20 minuti a far salire Paul sull'ambulanza.

translation.en: And he's not really responding to me or any of us.
translation.it: E non risponde a me o a nessuno di noi.

translation.en: [Miley] Once we were actually on our way, Paul called his granddad and was like,
translation.it: Quando eravamo in viaggio, Paul ha chiamato suo nonno e ha detto:

translation.en: "Yeah, we were in a boat accident." Like, "Oh yeah, they can't find Mallory."
translation.it: "C'è stato un incidente in barca. Ah, e non trovano Mallory".

translation.en: And was just like, "It was Cotton Top that did it." Cotton Top is Connor's nickname.
translation.it: E ha detto: "Sì, è stato Cotton Top". Che è il soprannome di Connor.

translation.en: [Connor] I was like, "Really?"
translation.it: Ho pensato, davvero?

translation.en: I wanted to beat the shit out of him, because I wasn't drivin'.
translation.it: Volevo pestarlo, non ero io alla guida.

translation.en: [Anthony] Mom, y'all need to come to Beaufort, quick.
translation.it: Mamma, dovete venire a Beaufort, presto.

translation.en: [Beverly] Obviously, when you get a call in the middle of the night, you know something's wrong.
translation.it: Quando ricevi una chiamata in piena notte, sai che qualcosa non va.

translation.en: [Anthony] What if she's at the bottom of the river, man?
translation.it: E se fosse in fondo al fiume?

translation.en: [Beverly] All he could say is, "We can't find Mallory."
translation.it: Diceva solo: "Non troviamo Mallory.

translation.en: "They can't find Mallory." And I said, "We're comin'."
translation.it: Non trovano Mallory." E ho detto: "Arriviamo.

translation.en: "We'll be there. We're comin' as fast as we can."
translation.it: Arriviamo il prima possibile".

translation.en: [officer 2] We've got water search and rescue out. The Parris Island Fire Department's out.
translation.it: C'è la ricerca e il salvataggio in acqua. I pompieri di Parris Island sono fuori.

translation.en: They've all got their water assets out there looking.
translation.it: Tutte le risorse la stanno cercando.

translation.en: Anthony kept sayin', "Has somebody called Mr. Phillip?"
translation.it: Anthony continuava a dire: "Qualcuno ha chiamato il sig. Phillip?

translation.en: "Has somebody called Miss Renee?" "Do it right now, because they need to know."
translation.it: Qualcuno ha chiamato la sig.ra Renee? Fatelo, perché devono sapere".

translation.en: [officer 1] Last name's Beach. Melanie? Mallory?
translation.it: - Il cognome è Beach? - Beach. Melanie? Mallory?

translation.en: I was just askin' about Mallory's family.
translation.it: Chiedevo della famiglia di Mallory.

translation.en: I do have phone numbers, but I don't wanna make that phone call,
translation.it: Ho i numeri, ma non voglio chiamare

translation.en: and I don't know…
translation.it: e non so…
